administration.name: administration
administration.description: Functions used in the Administration section: only for this section, it's generated a separate file which doesn't merge with the regular one. The only external module loaded is {{#crossLinkModule "ajax-loader"}}{{/crossLinkModule}}.

ajax-loader.name: ajax-loader
ajax-loader.description: Shows a loading image while page is loading, it handles ajax calls too.

buttons.name: buttons
buttons.description: Lessons and Elements actions triggered via buttons.

dashboard.name: dashboard
dashboard.description: Dashboard is the welcome page of DESY where you find shared lessons and elements. This handles elements interaction events.

dialogs.name: dialogs
dialogs.description: Dialogs, model and popup interaction. Open, close content management. Uses jQueryUI _dialog_

image-editor.name: image-editor
image-editor.description: Image editor functions, crop and textarea management.

lesson-editor.name: lesson-editor
lesson-editor.description: Lesson editor functions, it handles visual effects, CRUD actions on single slides and lessons, it handles tinyMCE editor too.

lesson-viewer.name: lesson-viewer
lesson-viewer.description: Lesson viewer, it handles slides switching and playlist menu effects.

media-element-loader.name: media-element-loader
media-element-loader.description: New media element popup handler, form validation errors handling.

notifications.name: notifications
notifications.description: Notification info and help assistant messages handler.

players.name: players
players.description: Media elements players: initializer, play, stop, update frame.

virtual-classroom.name: virtual-classroom
virtual-classroom.description: It's where users can share their lessons. It handles share lessons link and add to playlist actions.

classitems.description: Initializer for jQueryUI autocomplete on users serch into Admin Notifications.
